name: CWL Encoding for Process Deployment
abstract: Common Workflow Language (CWL) document encoding for Deploy/Replace operations. The request body is a complete CWL document (Workflow, CommandLineTool, or ExpressionTool).

sources.title: OGC API - Processes - Part 2: Deploy, Replace, Undeploy - CWL Encoding

examples.title: CWL Workflow - Water Bodies Detection
examples.content: Complete CWL workflow for water bodies detection from Terradue. This is a real-world example of a CWL document that can be deployed using the Deploy operation.
